description: Comprehensive task workflow to retrieve Sarah Miller's radiology data from relevant databases and APIs, ensuring all data is up-to-date and accurately reflects her medical history.

todoData.title: Radiology Data Retrieval for Sarah Miller
todoData.description: Comprehensive task workflow to retrieve Sarah Miller's radiology data from relevant databases and APIs, ensuring all data is up-to-date and accurately reflects her medical history.

todos.text: Identify relevant radiology databases and APIs containing Sarah Miller's data.

subTodos.text: Query parameter: patient → Sarah Miller’s UUID
Query parameter: category → LP29684-5 (LOINC code for Radiology).
Query parameter: date=ge2015-01-01 → only reports after Jan 1, 2015.
Query parameter: modality=CT, MR → restrict to CT and MRI studies (DICOM codes).
Query parameter: status=final → only completed radiology reports.
Query parameter: bodysite=416949008 → SNOMED code for Abdomen.
Query parameter: _count=5 → retrieve last 5 radiology reports

todos.text: Construct FHIR queries to retrieve DiagnosticReport resources for Sarah Miller.

Retrieve radiology reports using FHIR API:
curl -X GET 'https://api.bedfordshirehospitals.nhs.uk/fhir-prd/r4/DiagnosticReport?patient=8a7f0d23-56c1-4f9a-9c42-8e7a3d6f1b12&category=http://loinc.org|LP29684-5&date=ge2015-01-01&modality=http://dicom.nema.org/resources/ontology/DCM|CT&modality=http://dicom.nema.org/resources/ontology/DCM|MR&status=final&bodysite=http://snomed.info/sct|416949008&_sort=-date&_count=5' \
-H 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6ImJkZl9rZXlfMDEifQ.eyJpc3MiOiJodHRwczovL2F1dGguYmVkZm9yZHNoaXJlaG9zcGl0YWxzLm5ocy51ayIsInN1YiI6InNhaGFyLm1pbGxlciIsImF1ZCI6Imh0dHBzOi8vYXBpLmJlZGZvcmRzaGlyZWhvc3BpdGFscy5uaHMudWsiLCJzY29wZSI6InBhdGllbnQvRGlhZ25vc3RpY1JlcG9ydC5yZWFkIiwiZXhwIjoxNzIzNTUyMDAwLCJpYXQiOjE3MjM1NDk0MDB9.abc123' \
-H 'Accept: application/fhir+json' \
-H 'X-Request-ID: 7e4f5c12-9b2d-44a3-a7b9-82cf18a27d1e'
Parse and structure the retrieved radiology data for presentation in the canvas.
Present the retrieved and structured radiology data in the patient timeline.
